name: Sylvans
author: cjmcw
notes:
mushroom or bust. also, divine wrath steals so many games, I highly recommend it. 

last five were vs ssa, aromages, aliens, merchant sylvans, and dinos. 

not much else to say - I underestimated this deck at first, expecting it to be too inconsistent. but itâ€™s not as bad as I thought, and it just pluses so easily that it makes up for the bricks. 9/10 would KoG again
